name: Swiswi
body:
### Usage
Move the mouse cursor onto the top menu bar or the desktop background, make two-finger swipe on the touch pad. The current window will switch repeatedly just like pressing Cntl-F4. 
Press Cntl or Shif together with the swipe for the Cntl-Tab action.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
